title: Giants, Cardinals, Raiders, and the NFL draft
itunes:title: Giants, Cardinals, Raiders, and the NFL draft
description:
Colin breaks down the first round of the NFL draft while explaining why the New York Giants have no idea what they are doing. Also what he thinks of the Oakland Raiders picks, and why the Arizona Cardinals got too greedy. Guests include Joel Klatt, Charles Davis, Reggie Bush, and Cole Tucker.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
